name: Honeybee Garden
description: Welcom to Honeybee Garden, this is a clicker idle game. You can plant flowers in your garden and buy bees, and then bees will gather honey, and make you rich. When you are rich, you can expand your honeybee garden by planting more flowers and buying more bees. With your hard work, you will have the most beautiful gardens and become honeybee tycoon.
